attributes.action: Car insurance, if your not born in UK, it increases, regardless of age & lenght.
attributes.background: example came to UK when 4 yrs have english higher education 16 yrs no claims bonus, but still pay extra,  this should not apply to every one, only custom to certain conditions like in UK under 5 years rather.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
